metadata.name: Application Removed Via Wmic.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the removal or uninstallation of an application via "Wmic.EXE".

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\wmic.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('wmic.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('call')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('uninstall')))

output.summary: Detects the removal or uninstallation of an application via "Wmic.EXE".
